page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: On a{school day mornings}many of us watch Breakfast Television whilst eating our cereals. When{school closes at 3.30,}home life begins after a quick tea, we meet at the{Three Cornered Rec.}to play {football.}Other friends have{swimming or{dancing lessons. Many boys over 7 years are{Beavers}or {Cubs}and the girls are Brownies, We meet weekly and do our badge work at home. Most girls and fewer boys play close to home or in their gardens on bicycles,at rounders,{French Cricket, and{Hide'n Seek.}Most children have pets to look after. We watch{children's television}and some adult programmes to! If dad has time he helps us with our{modeling. We enjoy{reading}to.
